title: Bitcoin Held Steady Above $26K Over Weekend; XRP, LTC Buck Market Trend

title: Token founder swindled in $250k scam, points finger at Crypto.com
description: Glow Token LLC has filed a lawsuit against major cryptocurrency exchange Crypto.com, seeking over $250,000 in damages after falling victim to an apparent scam. According to court documents, Glow Token CEO Bryan Lawrence was approached by individuals posing as Crypto.com employees, who deceived him into transferring funds for listing Glow’s cryptocurrency on the exchange. The ... Read more
